info.description: Enterprise WhatsApp Manager & Kanban CRM API
info.title: WhatPro Hub API

get.description: Get a paginated list of all accounts (Super Admin only)

post.description: Create a new account manually (Super Admin)

get.description: Get a list of WhatsApp providers for a specific account

post.description: Create a new WhatsApp provider integration

get.description: Get a list of teams for a specific account

post.description: Create a new team in the account

get.description: Get a list of users for a specific account

post.description: Create a new user (Agent) in the account

delete.description: remove a user from the account

get.description: Get details of a specific account
Get details of currently logged in user

post.description: Rotate access tokens using refresh token
Validates Chatwoot token and issues WhatPro Hub JWT

get.description: Get details of a specific provider

delete.description: Remove a provider from the account

get.description: Check if the provider is reachable and active
Get details of a specific team

delete.description: Remove a team from the account

get.description: Get users assigned to a team

post.description: Assign a user to a team

delete.description: Unassign a user from a team
